basic.name: Gift of Life (Q)
basic.description: Sacrifice 15% of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an allied Hero for 150% of that amount.Passive: Increase Alexstrasza's Health regeneration by 150%.Dragonqueen: Breath of LifeCooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.

basic.name: Abundance (W)
basic.description: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 20% of their maximum Health.Dragonqueen: PreservationHeal area and amount greatly increased.

basic.name: Flame Buffet (E)
basic.description: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for 75 damage over 5.5 seconds.Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals 125 bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by 40% decaying over 2 seconds, and refunds the Mana cost.Dragonqueen: Wing BuffetDamage and Knockback enemies in an arc.

heroic.name: Life-Binder (R)
heroic.description: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

heroic.name: Cleansing Flame (R)
heroic.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 Health.2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

trait.name: Dragonqueen (T)
trait.description: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 Health.While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Abilities are empowered, and her Basic Attacks deal 143 damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 in an arc in front of her. Additionally, the duration of incoming Stuns, Roots, and Slows, is reduced by 50%.Lasts 15 seconds.

1.name: Live and Let Live
1.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

1.name: Circle of Life
1.description: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.Reward: After collecting 10 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

1.name: Flames of Fury
1.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Flame Buffet from 50 to 40.Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

4.name: Surge of Vitality
4.description: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Heat Exhaustion
4.description: Increase Flame Buffet's Slow from 40% to 50% and cause it to no longer decay.

4.name: Exuberance
4.description: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

7.name: Lifeblossom
7.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.Passive: Reduces the cost of Gift of Life to 10% of Alexstrasza's current Health.

7.name: Verdant Flourish
7.description: Alexstrasza receives 40% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

7.name: Fire Within
7.description: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

10.name: Life-Binder
10.description: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

10.name: Cleansing Flame
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 Health.2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

13.name: Dragon Scales
13.description: Gain 50 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

13.name: Pacify
13.description: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

13.name: Life Unbound
13.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 damage to nearby enemies.Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

16.name: Tough Love
16.description: Gift of Life grants its target 10 Armor for 2.5 seconds, increased to 30 while Alexstrasza is above 75% Health.

16.name: Overprotective
16.description: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 6 seconds equal to 70% of the amount healed.

16.name: Draconic Discipline
16.description: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 6 seconds, and Basic Attack healing by 50%.

20.name: On Ruby Wings
20.description: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.

20.name: Ancient Flame
20.description: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet.

20.name: Blessing of the Red
20.description: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.
